price: (59) But yes, there had come to you My verses, but you denied them and were arrogant, and you were among the disbelievers.
arabic: بَلَىٰ قَدۡ جَآءَتۡكَ ءَايَٰتِي فَكَذَّبۡتَ بِهَا وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرۡتَ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: balā qad jāatka āyātī fakadhabta bihā wa-is'takbarta wakunta mina al-kāfirīna
